Made in USA† with a 20-year limited warranty and 90-day comfort guarantee. Certified Organic Bedding Browse our collection of bestselling, handmade, made-to-order certified organic bedding including pillows, sheet sets, bed blankets, throws, comforters, mattress toppers, mattress and pillow protectors, underbed pads and more. Our high-quality and durable, certified organic pet beds are made with organic cotton and organic latex and feature a removable, machine-washable, zippered cover. Sold in multiple sizes and designs your best friend will love. Shop Organic Pet Beds Certified Organic Home Textiles Shop our collection of exclusive, handmade organic textiles for the whole home. Shower curtains, hand towels, hot plates, aprons, ironing board covers and more - perfect for your own home and great for gift giving too. Shop Organic Home Textiles Certified Organic Youth & Baby Products From plush toys to nursing pillows, toddler pillows to sleepsuits and rompers we have everything you need for sleep and play; to build an organic nursery or youth bedroom. Great for your own home, and perfect for gift giving too. Made with certified organic and natural ingredients, our Naturally Safer personal care products have been best sellers for more than 20 years. Shampoo, conditioner, soaps, lotions and more. Lifekind mattresses are certified organic to the Global Organic Textile Standard ("GOTS") - the leading organic standard for textiles. Made by hand in California or Colorado, our mattresses feature a limited 20-year warranty,90-day comfort exchange and many unique design features including dual-comfort options, sculpted surfaces, floating pillow tops, support for adjustable bases and more. Sleep Organic!® GOTS is a widely respected certification for organic fibers and textiles, encompassing clothing, bedding, and household goods. The certification process spans the entire supply chain, ensuring stringent standards for sourcing organic raw materials, sustainable production processes, and fair labor practices. Annual Certification SCS Global Services' Indoor Advantage Gold Certification evaluates indoor air quality of low-emission products, emphasizing manufacturers' commitment to healthier indoor environments. The 'Gold' seal, awarded to top-performing products, transparently communicates superior indoor air quality. Free Shipping All mattresses ship free to your door. We also offer mattress haul-away and upgraded delivery options including in-home delivery and setup for a fee. Made in USA† Made to order in California and Colorado, Lifekind certified organic mattresses exhibit true made-in-the-USA quality. Read our Story 20-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY All Lifekind mattresses feature our industry-leading, limited 20-year warranty. Expect lasting quality, comfort and support. 90-DAY COMFORT EXCHANGE Our exceptional sales team can assist you in selecting the perfect mattress based on your sleep profile. Then, if needed, you have as many as 90 days to adjust comfort, or request an exchange. Learn More About our Certifications We invite you to learn more about Lifekind - our story (so far), the team and our many industry firsts. Complete the form below to request your free copy of the Lifekind printed catalog. Shawn 02/02/2024 Crystallite Deodorant Spray The best shampoo that gives you tons of volume! We are so grateful to LifeKind for the excellent quality of your organic mattresses, blankets, pillows, mattress protectors and sheets. We have been purchasing our bedding from LifeKind for the past ten years. It is reassuring to know that our bedding is chemical free, and at the same time beautifully made. Thank you, LifeKind for your fine products and your friendly, reliable and professional customer service. Barbara B. Sublime comfort ... From my beautifully supportive box-spring foundation, to my luxury cotton sheets and soft, soft, soft weighted blanket - to even my shampoos and conditioners - nothing I have purchased here at LifeKind has been anything but sublime. My box-spring foundation is built so well that an elephant could sleep on it and it wouldn't make a dent. My sheets, combined with my weighted blanket, are so soft and comfortable that I sleep better - and longer - than I have in years. And the shampoo + conditioner? My hair is so pretty, smooth and soft that I can't stop running my hands through it after it's washed. To be honest, if I ever need any other bedding or another box-spring foundation? I'll not shop anywhere else - because yes - I love what I've purchased that much! Nicole 01/08/2024 Soft, organic, perfect! Our home is outfitted with bedding from lifekind. The cotton sheets and duvet covers are buttery soft and the quality is great. I shopped another brand when bedding was sold out here and that other company's sheets were not nearly as soft and lovely. Customer service has been fantastic too when I've reached out with questions. A. Softest sheets These are the softest organic sheets I have ever used!  I'm very happy to have found them. Lynne T.
